main.name: Michael Jonay Trujillo Padilla
main.description: I am a Backend Developer with a passion for creating and maintaining web applications. I have a strong background in web development and have worked with a variety of technologies, including PHP, JavaScript, and MySQL. I am currently working on a project to create a web application for a local business. I am currently looking for a position in the field of web development.
